block_detail:
Control which apps use the VPN connection. Apps you block here will connect directly without going through the VPN.

Note: Changes take effect after reconnecting the VPN.
about_description: ShineNET VPN is a free, open-source application that provides secure and private internet access. Our mission is to ensure everyone has the freedom to browse the internet safely and without restrictions.
error_timeout: Connection timeout. Please check your internet and try again.
error_domain: Unable to retrieve server data. Please try again.
error_get_version: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.
error_no_server_connected: No servers available at the moment. Please try again shortly.
error_permission: VPN permission required. Please allow VPN access to continue.
update_description: A new version is ready for download. Tap to get the latest features and improvements.
update_install: No compatible updates found for your device.
error_change_server: Please disconnect first, then select a different server.
vpn_connection: Another VPN is already active. Please disconnect it first.
request_limit: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
error_max_retries_reached: Connection failed after several attempts. Please check your internet connection.
no_healthy_servers: No healthy servers available. Fetching new servers...
select_healthy_server: Please select Automatic or a healthy server.
server_testing_in_progress: Server testing is already in progress. Please wait.
failed_connect_selected_server: Failed to connect to selected server: {{error}}
no_servers_direct_connection: No servers available for direct connection.
connection_secure_private: Your connection is secure and private
server_connection_failed: Server connection failed. Please try again.
server_testing_complete: Complete server testing finished. {{count}} servers are working.
app_safe_mode: App is running in safe mode
error_initialization: The application encountered an error during initialization. Please restart the app.
security_message: This application cannot run on modified or jailbroken devices for security reasons.
